holidays.title: Abolition Day
holidays.description: Abolition Day also commemorates the abolition of serfdom and other forms of involuntary servitude.

holidays.title: Belmont Stakes
holidays.description: Join us in celebrating the 154th year of horse racing at the Belmont Stakes.

holidays.title: EHS Day
holidays.description: National EHS Awareness Day is observed every year to spread awareness about electromagnetic hypersensitivity syndrome.

holidays.title: National Ballpoint Pen Day
holidays.description: For many, the ballpoint pen holds a special place in their pen holder.

holidays.title: National Bed Bug Prevention Day
holidays.description: Observe National Bed Bug Prevention Day by getting rid of these tiny yet pesky little things.

holidays.title: National Black Cow Day
holidays.description: Raise your glasses as we celebrate a soothing summery beverage that is loved by all.

holidays.title: National Call Your Doctor Day
holidays.description: This day reminds and encourages women to schedule their yearly Well-Woman Exam.

holidays.title: National Colt Day
holidays.description: Explore the origin, history, and fun trivia about the lively name Colt.

holidays.title: National Egg Roll Day
holidays.description: Join us as we unwrap the layers surrounding the origins of this delicious yet underrated treat.

holidays.title: National Forklift Safety Day
holidays.description: Do your bit of the heavy lifting today and commit to safe working environments.

holidays.title: National Herbs and Spices Day
holidays.description: Try to stop your mouth from watering as we dive headfirst into seasonings and condiments!

holidays.title: National Isabel Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the beautiful and archaic name — Isabel.  Read along to know more.

holidays.title: Portugal Day
holidays.description: Learn about one of Europe's most powerful colonial empires and its liberation struggle.

holidays.title: Poson Festival
holidays.description: Held at full moon, this day commemorates the introduction of Buddhism to Sri Lanka.

holidays.title: Royal Ascot
holidays.description: Watch the centuries-old Flat racing meeting Royal Ascot held every year in England.

holidays.title: Slavery Abolition Day (French Guiana)
holidays.description: Slavery Abolition Day commemorates the liberation of enslaved Africans in French Guiana.

holidays.title: Judy Garland’s Birthday
holidays.description: Judy Garland was one of the brightest movie stars of Hollywood’s golden era.

holidays.title: Kate Upton’s Birthday
holidays.description: With her hunger for success, Upton’s an unmatched force with no limits or fear.

holidays.title: Lucy Bella Earl’s Birthday
holidays.description: Lucy Bella Earl is sometimes called an edutuber; we think that's just neat!

holidays.title: Prince Philip’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this Prince, satisfaction comes through service and relating to his people.

holidays.title: Sasha Obama’s Birthday
holidays.description: Sasha Obama is still young, yet she has captivated the hearts of many.

holidays.title: Taylor Armstrong’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality T.V. star has endeared herself to fans all around the world.

holidays.title: Theresa Caputo’s Birthday
holidays.description: Theresa Caputo sees, hears, and feels things differently than we do in the physical world.
